item.title: Lisa add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Lisa add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dave Matthews Band
item.description: "Turns out, not where, but who you're with that really matters." -- Dave Matthews Band

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dave Matthews Band
item.description: "Troubles, they may come and go, but good times, they're the gold." -- Dave Matthews Band

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dave Matthews
item.description: "the future is no place to place your better days" -- Dave Matthews

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dave Matthews
item.description: "Some might tell you there's no hope in hand Just because they feel hopeless But you don't have to be a thing like that You be a ship in a bottle set sail " -- Dave Matthews

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dave Matthews Band
item.description: "She feels like kicking out all the windows And setting fire to this life She could change everything about her using colors bold and bright" -- Dave Matthews Band

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Lisa add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Just for the record, the weather today is calm and sunny, but the air is full of bullshit." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "For you, a thousand times over" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I don't want to die without any scars." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Lisa add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "I wonder how many people I've looked at all my life and never seen." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "When I looked at you, my life made sense. Even the bad things made sense. They were necessary to make you possible." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Don't let the bastards grind you down." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "It's the tragedy of loving, you can't love anything more than something you miss." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Now that she had nothing to lose, she was free." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Your heart is my piÃ±ata." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Only after disaster can we be resurrected. It's only after you've lost everything that you're free to do anything. Nothing is static, everything is evolving, everything is falling apart." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Emily Bronte
item.description: "She burned too bright for this world." -- Emily Bronte

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Carol Shields
item.description: "There are chapters in every life which are seldom read, and certainly not aloud." -- Carol Shields
